targets.query:
SELECT 8 * derivative(last("value"),1s) FROM "cloudswitch" WHERE "port" = 'ether9-slave-local' AND "direction" = 'rx' AND 
"stat" = 'byte' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT 8 * derivative(last("value"),1s) FROM "cloudswitch" WHERE "port" = 'ether9-slave-local' AND "direction" = 'tx' AND 
"stat" = 'byte' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
